comment.author: 32214524@N00
comment._content: Does the Smithsonian still display this photographic equipment?

comment.author: 27742125@N06
comment._content: There is a small group of cameras that will be on exhibit when the Museum reopens Nov. 21, 2008 in a case by the entrance.  Most of the12,000 pieces of photographic apparatus are safely and securely stored off-site.

comment.author: 8892367@N05
comment._content: This photograph is featured in a blog post at THE BIGGER PICTURE.
